alert.note: Alert for Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 5:08AM PST until January 25 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility of one quarter of mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Simcoe Highlands. In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon, North Central Oregon and Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
